reviewHighlights.text: UBERMOSH Vol.5 is a fast, arcade-style arena game built for short, repeatable runs. It throws you into a neon combat pit and asks you to survive a tim...
I really tried to enjoy this game, but after spending more time with it, the experience started to feel disappointing. The idea itself is fine â€” short...
